SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT M.*, U.NICK_NAME, U.GRADE, U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH, NVL((SELECT L.NO FROM LIKES L WHERE L.POST_NO = M.NO AND L.USER_ID = #{userId} AND L.BOARD_CODE = 'CT04'), 0) AS LIKE_NO FROM MEALS M LEFT JOIN USERS U ON (M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID)
M.NO < #{no}
ORDER BY M.NO DESC) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10) b

WITH LIKE_COUNT AS (SELECT POST_NO, COUNT(*) CN FROM LIKES GROUP BY POST_NO ORDER BY CN DESC, POST_NO)
SELECT M.*, NVL(LC.CN, 0) AS CN, NVL((SELECT L.NO FROM LIKES L WHERE L.POST_NO = M.NO AND L.USER_ID = #{userId} AND L.BOARD_CODE = 'CT04'),0) AS LIKE_NO FROM MEALS M LEFT JOIN LIKE_COUNT LC ON M.NO = LC.POST_NO
WHERE rownum < 8

SELECT U.NICK_NAME, U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH, M.*, (SELECT F.FOLLOWEE_ID FROM FOLLOW F JOIN MEALS M ON (F.FOLLOWEE_ID = M.USER_ID AND F.FOLLOWER_ID = #{userId} AND M.NO = #{no})) AS FOLLOWEE_ID, NVL((SELECT L.NO FROM LIKES L WHERE L.POST_NO = M.NO AND L.USER_ID = #{userId} AND L.BOARD_CODE = 'CT04'),0) AS LIKE_NO FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN MEALS M ON (U.USER_ID = M.USER_ID) WHERE M.NO = #{no} ORDER BY M.NO
